document_data.name: Inwe
document_data.mainbody:
'''Inwe''' was a [[druid]] and a member of the circle that dwelled in the [[Emerald Grove]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|I felt honorured when I was chosen to participate. Now I feel guilty I didn't object.|''Inwe, in regards to the Rite of Thorns.''}}
document_data.Relationships: Inwe served alongside [[Aelar]], [[Karrik (druid)|Karrik]], [[Tahan]] and others under [[Archdruid]] [[Halsin]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Archdruid Halsin departed the grove for a time to investigate the whereabouts of the ''[[Nightsong]]'' a mysterious artifact that he believed was hidden beneath the nearby [[Shattered Sanctum]]. After he left, the druid [[Kagha]] took over leadership of the Emerald Grove and tasked Inwe and the other druids with performing the ''[[Rite of Thorns]]''. This ritual would disguise the location of the grove from outsiders and prevent anyone else like [[Elturel|Elturian]] [[tiefling]] refugees from threatening its wellbeing. Inwe felt pride at being among the druids chosen to before the rite.
